metadata.name: Digital Wonderland
metadata.description:
Shanty Town
Angry father
Broken dreams 

Digital wonderland is the story of a child living in a slum trying to escape his environment by all means . He finds refuge in this alternate reality where he finally gets what he is looking for : Peace. 
__________________

In this short animation  I'm looking at technology as a tool of liberation. Today more than ever, technology & virtual worlds are tools of advancement & social change. For kids on my continent , it is a symbol of hope. 

A way to keep dreaming & aspire to better lives. 


Artwork | SFX & VFX : Rakimjah

End music : Henri-Michel Ochoumare
